summary: Utility class that supports configuring, visualizing, and managing hierarchical temporal memory (HTM) models with optional HSS integration. It provides helpers for initializing the object, retrieving scenario definitions, drawing parameter sets, logging configuration details, and handling related modules.
business_intent: Enable users to set up and run HTM simulations with or without the HSS component by offering streamlined methods for scenario selection, parameter visualization, logging, and module management.
